column2: In your ENTIRE LIFE, have you ever:  a. Smoked at least 50 cigars?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, have you ever:  b. Smoked a pipe at least 50 times?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, have you ever:  c. Used snuff, such as Skoal, Skoal Bandit or Copenhagen at least 20 times?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, have you ever:  d. Used chewing tobacco, such as Redman, Levi Garrett or Beechnut at least 20 times?
